column4: I tried to install muine, it installed but i'm getting a seg fault when trying to import my folder, is there any way I can uninstall it and all of the stuff that was installed along with it?
You can type apt-cache show muine and it'll tell you all of the programs that muine depends on
You can then go and try and remove them in synaptic and see if they try and remove other packages
If it tries to remove a bunch of stuff that you use, then click on edit->unmark all
